tool_description: Creates navigation flow diagrams and screen hierarchies for mobile app structure planning, defining user journeys and screen relationships.

app_type.description: Type of mobile application (e.g., social, ecommerce, productivity, gaming, utility)

target_platform.description: Target platform: iOS, Android, or cross-platform

main_features.description: List of main app features and functionalities

error_messages: Invalid app type: Provide a recognized app category (social, ecommerce, productivity, gaming, utility, etc.)
Invalid platform: Use iOS, Android, or cross-platform
Empty features list: Provide at least one main feature for the app
usage: Specify app_type, target_platform, and main_features to generate a comprehensive screen flow diagram showing navigation paths and screen relationships.

flow_diagram.description: Text-based representation of the screen flow structure

screen_list.description: List of all identified screens in the app

navigation_patterns.description: Recommended navigation patterns for the app type
